values.title: Elbert Hubbard
values.desc: A friend is someone who knows all about you and still loves you

values.title: Mark Twain
values.desc: Good friends good books and a sleepy conscience this is the ideal life

values.title: Friedrich Nietzsche
values.desc: It is not a lack of love but a lack of friendship that makes unhappy marriages

values.title: Bob Marley
values.desc: The truth is everyone is going to hurt you You just got to find the ones worth suffering for

values.title: Joan Powers
values.desc: If you live to be a hundred I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you

values.title: Linda Grayson
values.desc: There is nothing better than a friend unless it is a friend with chocolate

values.title: Helen Keller
values.desc: I would rather walk with a friend in the dark than alone in the light

values.title: Sarah Dessen
values.desc: Life is an awful ugly place to not have a best friend

values.title: Aristotle
values.desc: What is a friend A single soul dwelling in two bodies

values.title: Anais Nin
values.desc: Each friend represents a world in us a world possibly not born until they arrive and it is only by this meeting that a new world is born

values.title: Richelle Mead
values.desc: Only a true best friend can protect you from your immortal enemies
